p: 6-Shogaol has been demonstrated to have potential anticancer activities towards human renal-cell carcinoma 786-O [ 76] and ovarian cancer cell lines A2780 [ 77], and head and neck squamous cell carcinoma cell lines [ 78]. Studies showed that 6-shogaol had a dose-dependent antiproliferative effect and induced the apoptosis of head and neck squamous cell carcinoma cell lines by downregulating survivin [ 78]. 6-Gingerol inhibited STAT-3 translocation of ovarian cancer cells to inhibit cell proliferation and induce apoptosis [ 77].
